content.title: Menopause is an integral part of the functioning of the female body. It turns out that men can influence its offensive. How - he knows I WANT.

content.text: According to statistics, most men prefer young women. This is inherent in nature, and only some representatives of the stronger sex choose companions older than themselves. Scientists at McMaster University argue that in these women, the sign of youth (fertility) persists into old age . They also invented a special computation model and computer simulation, proving that men preferring young women cause a number of factors that negatively affect fertility and ultimately lead to menopause.

In an interview with the Sunshine Coast Daily, geneticist Rama Singha argues that if men liked older women, nature would allow them to maintain their reproductive functions for as long as possible throughout their lives and postpone the onset of menopause to a later age.

An interesting fact is that young people living with an adult woman who decided to have children influenced the later onset of menopause. Therefore, in our age it is so easy to explain why many women choose to live with a partner who is much younger than her.
